item.title: Practically, Go 1.25's Container-Aware GOMAXPROCS: What You Need to Know
item.description:
Go 1.25 just dropped with expected changes to GOMAXPROCS, which significantly change how Go applications behave in containerized environments. The runtime now automatically detects and respects container CPU limits when setting GOMAXPROCS. This isn’t just a minor improvementâ€”it’s a shift that may dramatically improve performance for millions of containerized Go applications.

And this isn’t the only amazing change, but this is the one I’ll focus on in this post.
